text: Sinomonas notoginsengisoli is a Gram-positive, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Sinomonas which has been isolated from rhizospheric soil from the plant Panax notoginseng from the Wenshan district in China. ==References== Category:Bacteria described in 2015 Category:Actinobacteria
title: Sinomonas notoginsengisoli
